issue.title: ign log record --file <FILE> cannot overwrite an existing file

content.raw:
I believe this was an intentional design decision to prevent accidentally overwriting log files, which could be disastrous.

What if we add a `-f` or `--force` option flag that will allow us to overwrite existing log files?

We could also consider a `-a` or `--append` option flag that would add the new messages to an existing log.
